name: The World's Easiest Platformer
description:
(IMPT: Please refresh the page once you have loaded the web game once. This is due to a web video bug.)

The World's Easiest Platformer 
 It's the easiest platformer game. How can you possibly not finish the game? 
A meta game in a game where you play as a player playing a platformer, as you fend real world distractions out of your control to complete the game.

Controls (when available..): Left Arrow, Right Arrow, Space

Credits
Programmer: alanng.me
3D Artist: vanthegoh
Title Animator: adiot
2D Artists: denise, michael
Composer: Virtua_T
Special Thanks: Zayar
